title: Paperspigot端自带的启动器
author: Reliable_han
txt_content:
Paper端自带启动器怎么关闭

replies.author: 思念化作海
replies.txt_content:
启动参数后面加上nogui

比如java -jar 服务端核心.jar nogui

replies.txt_content:
